snippet: CLARK--Barbara M. June 12, 1939 - February 22, 2016. A giant has fallen! She was committed to Andrew Jackson High School, public education, children and the aged, her family and community. Brilliant, caring, compassionate and our very good friend. We shall miss her. Marvin & Evelyn Jones Rich 1/3
lead_paragraph: CLARK--Barbara M. June 12, 1939 - February 22, 2016. A giant has fallen! She was committed to Andrew Jackson High School, public education, children and the aged, her family and community. Brilliant, caring, compassionate and our very good friend. We shall miss her. Marvin & Evelyn Jones Rich 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CLARK, BARBARA M
